entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
